allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-image gallery with carousel functionality

- Extend database structure: Add images array to all vehicles
- Vehicle detail page: Replace single image with Bootstrap carousel
  - Show single image when only one image available
  - Show carousel with navigation and thumbnails for multiple images
  - Add image counter badge
  - Thumbnails clickable to navigate between images
- CSS updates:
  - Use object-fit: contain to prevent image cropping
  - Add carousel styling with black background
  - Responsive thumbnail gallery
- Update vehicles.js to use first image from images array
- Provider dashboard: Support multiple image URLs
  - Change image input to textarea (comma-separated URLs)
  - Parse and save multiple images in create/edit functions
  - Display existing images as comma-separated list in edit form
- Maintain backward compatibility with img field

)")
